abstract: In a joint statement, the two companies said that they had “decided to part ways” after working together since 2005 on Coke Zero ads in North America.
snippet: In a joint statement, the two companies said that they had “decided to part ways” after working together since 2005 on Coke Zero ads in North America.
lead_paragraph: A plum advertising assignment is up for grabs with the news that the creative agency that helped introduce Coke Zero will no longer be working on the brand’s advertising in North America.

headline.main: Coca-Cola Is Replacing Crispin Porter on Coke Zero Account
